certifications.name: Mobile App Black Belt (Google Sales Mastery Certification)

recommendations:
Bruce Kerr-Peterson

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          Mathieu is a proactive and tireless contributor who would make a great addition to any team. Mathieu worked tirelessly to lead and build a successful App Developer sales team at Google. I would recommend Mathieu for any position, as he naturally rises to the occasion when presented with something he is passionate about.

Daan Ramaekers

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          As a new hire, Mathieu managed to provide me with the tools, knowledge and guidance needed to make my ramp-up period incredibly efficient. He is open for feedback and values the input of the people he works with. His helpful and open approach combined with a professional, yet amicable, attitude is what makes him and his team excell. I had the pleasure to see up close how Mathieu consistently reaches any goal he puts in front of himself. He is not one to accept the status quo, and combined with his entrepreneurial spirit he challenges himself beyond what is necessary to continuously outperforms targets. As a friend and a colleague, I recommend Mathieu to anyone looking to grow a business.
